FUNCTION_BLOCK Axis_REF_SML EXTENDS Axis_REF_Base_SML
The Axis_REF_SML function block serves as the interface for all public
function blocks that work on the axis.  It contains the parameters and
other members needed by every Axis_REF implementation.
